name: Flox Don't Stop
description:
Flox the flightless bird must work with Blox, the objects falling from the sky to climb to new heights! Collect the feather to keep Blox full of resources.  Don't fall off screen, Don't get crushed, and Flox Don't Stop!

Designed as a Co-op game to be played through 1 game pad and 1 keyboard.

Solo mode can be done entirely through game pad.

***Game is in early development, we appreciate feedback and are aware of some bugs,  we are actively pursing solutions to these issues.***

This game was developed in 2 weeks
